channel.title: CVE Feed for qutebrowser -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for qutebrowser -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10895|2024-08-05T07:54:36.258Z -- qutebrowser -- cross-site%20request%20forgery%20flaw%20allows%20sites%20to%20access%20%27qute
item.description: qutebrowser before version 1.4.1 is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery flaw that allows websites to access 'qute://*' URLs. A malicious website could exploit this to load a 'qute://settings/set' URL, which then sets 'editor.command' to a bash script, resulting in arbitrary code execution.
